Data

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the Order entity with the attributes id, table, timeStamp, staff, serviceCharge, gst, closed, listOfOrderedItems, listOfOrderedPacakages, membershipDiscount. This class represents an Order. This entity class is Serializable. Allowing this entity to be written as an object into a text file.
    Since:
    24th October 2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bansal Ankur
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
